com.masprop.cluster1.sudoku.controller.dancingLinks
Class SudokuRandomizer

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      com.masprop.cluster1.sudoku.controller.dancingLinks.SudokuRandomizer

public class SudokuRandomizer
extends java.util.Observable

This class randomizes the generations of any NxN sudoku The extension point is the SudokuAlgorithm. Therefore different Alogrithms which solve a Sudoku can use this for totally random Sudoku generations.

Author:
Anshuman Mehta

Constant Field Values

gameLevel

public com.masprop.cluster1.shared.model.GameLevelType gameLevel

N

public int N

n

public int n

row

private boolean[][] row
row[r][i] is true if and only the number i has been already placed in the row r.

column

private boolean[][] column
column[c][i] is true if and only the number i has been already placed in the column c.

zone

private boolean[][] zone
zone[z][i] is true if and only if the number i has been already placed in zone z. For a row r and column c the corresponding zone number is n * (r / n) + (c / n)

sudoku

private int[][] sudoku
the generated sudoku

partialSudoku

private int[][] partialSudoku
The sudoku randomizer initial state is empty for generation of a completely new random sudoku initial state is set by the user for creation of a sudoku from his/her choices
